title: Facebook : global penetration rage as of June 2017 , by region
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of population using Facebook for 8 number of Countrys.
The maximum Share of population using Facebook 72.4 is found at Country North America and the minimum is found at Africa where Country is 12.7.
The lowest value at Country Africa is 5.7x times less than the highest value at North America.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of population using Facebook for 8 number of Countrys.
Country North America has the highest Share of population using Facebook and Africa has the lowest Share of population using Facebook.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of population using Facebook for 8 number of Countrys.
The maximum Share of population using Facebook 72.4 is found at Country North America and the minimum is found at Africa where Country is 12.7.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of population using Facebook in the y axis.
The Share of population using Facebook is appeared to be the highest at Country North America and lowest at Country Africa.
The difference of Share of population using Facebook between the highest and lowest Country is 59.7.
The Country North America has the highest Share of population using Facebook, followed by , and Oceania / Australia. Down to the Country Africa which is the lowest.
The highest value 72.4 at North America is almost 1.89 times larger than the average value 38.36.
The Share of population using Facebook is 306.9 if we add up values of all Countrys.
